long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabMania, manage your Chrome Tabs.

TabMania helps you to list all your Chrome Tabs in a single place, allow you to search the Tabs with title, or url. You can easily jump to the tab, or close the tab.
TabMania also highlight duplicated Chrome Tabs, and provide one-click to close all these tabs.
TabMania shows a small number badge when current tab is having duplications.
